law.catch_line: Coverage deemed group health insurance -- Requirements for health benefit plans -- Member who no longer meets participation requirements.

text.section: Health benefit plan coverage obtained through an insurance purchasing outlet shall be deemed group health insurance in accordance with KRS 304.18-020.
Health benefit plans obtained through an insurance purchasing outlet shall meet the requirements in KRS 304.17A-200, 304.17A-220, and 304.17A-240.
An insurance purchasing outlet member who no longer meets participation requirements may, at the option of the member, remain a member of the insurance purchasing outlet until the time of renewal.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 207, sec. 9, effective July 15, 2002.
